alert.note: Alert for Malheur County; Oregon Lower Treasure Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 2:32PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Payette, northwestern Canyon, northwestern Owyhee, southwestern Gem and east central Malheur Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 330 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Greenleaf, or 9 miles west of Caldwell, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds to 30 mph and half inch hail frequent lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rain could lead to ponding of water on roadways. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Wilder, Greenleaf and Notus around 340 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Malheur County; Oregon Lower Treasure Valley
